headline: Bubble Watch: AI Is Changing Everything, But No One Pays For It (MSFT, NVDA)
summary: Summary: There is a growing belief that the AI sector may be facing a financial bubble due to unsustainable business models. Among the primary concerns is that nearly all AI users access AI tools for free, leaving companies like OpenAI and Anthropic without meaningful recurring revenue.
